theorem (in state_space) shows "\<Gamma>\<turnstile> \<lbrace>True\<rbrace> \<acute>S :== 0;; \<acute>I :== 1;; WHILE \<acute>I \<noteq> n INV \<lbrace>\<acute>S = (SUMM j<\<acute>I. j)\<rbrace> DO \<acute>S :== \<acute>S + \<acute>I;; \<acute>I :== \<acute>I + 1 OD \<lbrace>\<acute>S = (SUMM j<n. j)\<rbrace>"
